comment: Alternate (shorter) proof of ~ axc10 . One can prove a version with DV(x,y) without ~ ax-13 , by using ~ ax6ev instead of ~ ax6e . (Contributed by BJ, 31-Mar-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
